column1: '''Theodor Meir Bikel''' ([[2 May]] [[1924]]-[[21 July]] [[2015]]) was an Austrian-American actor, folk singer and current president of [[wikipedia:Associated Actors and Artistes of America
column2: Associated Actors and Artistes of America]]. In [[1980]], he voiced the part of [[Aragorn]] in [[The Return of the King (1980 film)
